Equipment Actions.Action 1: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 8 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Glaive, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 15 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Oni makes 2 attacks, either with its Claws or its Glaive
Other Actions.Action 2: Change Shape, The Oni can magically polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, into a Large Giant or back into its true form

Abilities.Ability 1: Innate Spellcasting, The Oni can innately cast a few spells
Abilities.Ability 2: Magic Weapons, The Oni's weapon attacks are magical
Abilities.Ability 3: Regeneration, The Oni heals at the start of its turn
